mapper.insert:
REPLACE INTO bi_visitor( ipv4, acr, eci, gender, age, localAddress, homeAddress, workAddress, expendAbility, time ) VALUES
( #{item.ipv4}, #{item.acr}, #{item.eci}, #{item.gender}, #{item.age}, #{item.localAddress}, #{item.homeAddress}, #{item.workAddress}, #{item.expendAbility}, #{item.time} )
mapper.select: select b.floor name,count(distinct a.userId) value from ${tableName} a join bi_maps b on a.mapId=b.mapId where b.storeId=#{storeId} group by name order by value desc

select b.shopName name,count(distinct a.userId) value from ${tableName} a left join bi_shop b on (a.x between least(b.xSpot*10,b.x1Spot*10) and greatest(b.xSpot*10,b.x1Spot*10)) and (a.y between least(b.ySpot*10,b.y1Spot*10) and greatest(b.ySpot*10,b.y1Spot*10)) and a.mapId=b.mapId left join bi_maps c on b.mapId=c.mapId where c.storeId=#{storeId} group by name order by value desc
